definition: to face squarely/to meet head on/to face up to
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Instead of running away from the problem, we are facing reality as it is.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有逃避問題，反之我是如實地正視實相。

sentences.english: To wear corrective lenses when driving.
sentences.chinese: 駕駛時須戴矯正視力的眼鏡。

sentences.english: Ayden: Well, yesterday, I decided to face my fear of heights.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，昨天我下定決心正視自己的恐高問題。

sentences.english: The goblin was trembling, unable to meet the red eyes high above his.
sentences.chinese: 那個妖精在發抖，不敢正視高高在上的那雙紅眼睛。

sentences.english: We must face the fact that we might lose the game .
sentences.chinese: 我們必須正視我們懇比賽失利這一事實。

sentences.english: You must face up to all the pressure, cant escape, more cant complain.
sentences.chinese: 你必須正視所有壓力，不能逃避，更不能抱怨。

sentences.english: She must face upto the fact that she is no longer young.
sentences.chinese: 她必須正視她已不再年輕這一事實。

sentences.english: What problems should be faced in the operating process of the aluminum doors and windows.
sentences.chinese: 斷橋鋁門窗在操作過程中應正視哪些問題問題。
什麼是科學的矯正視力？

sentences.english: A type of contact lens that can correct vision was recently launched in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙日前推出了一款號稱可矯正視力的隱形眼鏡。

sentences.english: He's tired of misplacing his glasses and may get laser surgery to correct his vision.
sentences.chinese: 他厭惡了戴眼鏡所以也許會接受激光手術來矯正視力。

sentences.english: Innovation is overrated. It's time to appreciate the power of the copycat.
sentences.chinese: 請勿過於高看創新，是時候正視山寨的力量了。

sentences.english: This issue was not faced in its brutal realism by General Gamelin.
sentences.chinese: 甘默林將軍沒有用無情的現實主義正視這一問題。

sentences.english: Face up to that fact, will help to deepen our understanding of Lu You's poetries.
sentences.chinese: 正視這一事實，有助於加深對陸游詩歌的認識。

sentences.english: For the sake of self-interest, China has to envisage the problem of RMB exchange rate.
sentences.chinese: 中國爲了自己的利益，也必須正視人民幣匯率的問題。

definition: to ignore/to neglect/to treat with contempt
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
